extension.description: Here you will find all the videos that have been "deleted" by Censorship from the public YouTube service. They are organized as they were originally posted - by their premiere dates, with their original titles and descriptions, and with the option to comment publicly.

Na tomto mieste nájdete všetky videá, ktoré boli Cenzúrou „zmazané“ z verejnej služby YouTube. Sú organizované tak ako boli pôvodne publikované – podľa dátumov ich premiéry, s originálnymi názvami a popismi, a s možnosťou verejne komentovať.
